mapper.sql: AREA_CODE_ID, AREA_NBR, AREA_CODE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE,CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM TB_AREA_CODE a LEFT JOIN TB_COMMON_REGION c ON c.AREA_CODE_ID = a.AREA_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN TB_REGION_LOCATION_REL r ON r.COMMON_REGION_ID = c.COMMON_REGION_ID LEFT JOIN TB_POLITICAL_LOCATION pl ON pl.LOC_ID = r.LOC_ID WHERE pl.LOC_ID = #{id} AND pl.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND r.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND c.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND a.STATUS_CD = '1000'

SELECT count(*) FROM TB_AREA_CODE A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.AREA_CODE_ID, WM_CONCAT ( B.REGION_NAME ) AS regionNames FROM TB_COMMON_REGION B WHERE B.STATUS_CD = '1000' GROUP BY B.AREA_CODE_ID) X ON A.AREA_CODE_ID = X.AREA_CODE_ID WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000'
AND (A.AREA_CODE like #{keyWord} OR X.regionNames like #{keyWord} OR A.AREA_NBR like #{keyWord})
